original_text: Lord God, it has now happened like that. Herod and Pontius Pilate have met together here in Jerusalem. They met with Israelite people and with people of other nations. Together they made plans to kill your holy servant, Jesus. He is the one that you chose to be your Messiah.
korean_text: 과연 헤롯과 본디오 빌라도는 이방인과 이스라엘 백성과 합세하여 하나님께서 기름 부으신 거룩한 종 예수를 거슬러

sentences.original_text: Lord God, it has now happened like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님, 그것이 지금 그렇게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Herod and Pontius Pilate have met together here in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯과 본디오 빌라도가 예루살렘에서 함께 모였습니다.

sentences.original_text: and with people of other nations.
Together they made plans to kill your holy servant, Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 함께 그들은 당신의 거룩한 종 예수를 죽일 계획을 세웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: He is the one that you chose to be your Messiah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 당신의 메시야로 선택하신 분입니다.
